verses.verse: Now these are the generations <WH8435> of Aaron <WH175> and Moses <WH4872> in the day <WH3117> that Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> with Moses <WH4872> in mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>.
And these are the names <WH8034> of the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175>: Nadab <WH5070> the first-born <WH1060>, and Abihu <WH30>, Eleazar <WH499>, and Ithamar <WH385>.
These are the names <WH8034> of the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175>, the priests <WH3548> that were anointed <WH4886>, whom he consecrated <WH4390> to minister in the priest <WH3547>'s office.

And Nadab <WH5070> and Abihu <WH30> died <WH4191> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, when they offered <WH7126> strange <WH2114> fire <WH784> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>, and they had no children <WH1121>; and Eleazar <WH499> and Ithamar <WH385> ministered in the priest <WH3547>'s office in the presence <WH6440> of Aaron <WH175> their father <WH1>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,
Bring <WH7126> the tribe <WH4294> of Levi <WH3878> near <WH7126>, and set <WH5975> them before <WH6440> Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548>, that they may minister unto him <WH8334>.

And they shall keep <WH8104> his charge <WH4931>, and the charge <WH4931> of the whole congregation <WH5712> before <WH6440> the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, to do <WH5647> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH4908>.

And they shall keep <WH8104> all the furniture <WH3627> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, and the charge <WH4931> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, to do <WH5647> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH4908>.
And thou shalt give <WH5414> the Levites <WH3881> unto Aaron <WH175> and to his sons <WH1121>: they are wholly given <WH5414> unto him on the behalf of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

And thou shalt appoint <WH6485> Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121>, and they shall keep <WH8104> their priesthood <WH3550>: and the stranger <WH2114> that cometh nigh <WH7131> shall be put to death <WH4191>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

And I <WH3947>, behold, I have taken the Levites <WH3881> from among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> instead of all the first-born <WH1060> that openeth <WH6363> the womb <WH7358> among the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; and the Levites shall be mine <WH3881>:

for all the first-born <WH1060> are mine <WH3117>; on the day that I smote <WH5221> all the first-born <WH1060> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> I hallowed <WH6942> unto me all the first-born <WH1060> in Israel <WH3478>, both man <WH120> and beast <WH929>; mine they shall be <WH3068>: I am Jehovah.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>, saying <WH559>,

Number <WH6485> the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> by their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, by their families <WH4940>: every male <WH2145> from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605> shalt thou number them <WH6485>.
And Moses <WH4872> numbered <WH6485> them according to the word <WH6310> of Jehovah <WH3068>, as he was commanded <WH6680>.
And these were the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> by their names <WH8034>: Gershon <WH1648>, and Kohath <WH6955>, and Merari <WH4847>.
And these are the names <WH8034> of the sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648> by their families <WH4940>: Libni <WH3845> and Shimei <WH8096>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> by their families <WH4940>: Amram <WH6019>, and Izhar <WH3324>, Hebron <WH2275>, and Uzziel <WH5816>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847> by their families <WH4940>: Mahli <WH4249> and Mushi <WH4187>. These are <WH1992> the families <WH4940> of the Levites <WH3881> according to their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>.
Of Gershon <WH1648> was the family <WH4940> of the Libnites <WH3846>, and the family <WH4940> of the Shimeites <WH8097>: these are the families <WH4940> of the Gershonites <WH1649>.

Those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH4557>, according to the number of all the males <WH2145>, from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, even those that were numbered <WH6485> of them were seven <WH7651> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>.
The families <WH4940> of the Gershonites <WH1649> shall encamp <WH2583> behind <WH310> the tabernacle <WH4908> westward <WH3220>.
And the prince <WH5387> of the fathers <WH1>' house <WH1004> of the Gershonites <WH1649> shall be Eliasaph <WH460> the son <WH1121> of Lael <WH3815>.

And the charge <WH4931> of the sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648> in the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150> shall be the tabernacle <WH168>, and the Tent <WH4908>, the covering <WH168> thereof <WH4372>, and the screen for the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>,

and the hangings <WH7050> of the court <WH2691>, and the screen <WH4539> for the door <WH6607> of the court <WH2691>, which is by the tabernacle <WH4908>, and by the altar <WH4196> round about <WH5439>, and the cords <WH4340> of it for all the service thereof <WH5656>.

And of Kohath <WH6955> was the family <WH4940> of the Amramites <WH6020>, and the family <WH4940> of the Izharites <WH3325>, and the family <WH4940> of the Hebronites <WH2276>, and the family <WH4940> of the Uzzielites <WH5817>: these are the families <WH4940> of the Kohathites <WH6956>.

According to the number <WH4557> of all the males <WH2145>, from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, there were eight <WH8083> thousand <WH505> and six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967>, keeping <WH8104> the charge <WH4931> of the sanctuary <WH6944>.
The families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> shall encamp <WH2583> on the side <WH3409> of the tabernacle <WH4908> southward <WH8486>.
And the prince <WH5387> of the fathers <WH1>' house <WH1004> of the families <WH4940> of the Kohathites <WH6956> shall be Elizaphan <WH469> the son <WH1121> of Uzziel <WH5816>.

And their charge <WH4931> shall be the ark <WH727>, and the table <WH7979>, and the candlestick <WH4501>, and the altars <WH4196>, and the vessels <WH3627> of the sanctuary <WH6944> wherewith they minister <WH8334>, and the screen <WH4539>, and all the service thereof <WH5656>.

And Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> shall be prince <WH5387> of the princes <WH5387> of the Levites <WH3881>, and have the oversight <WH6486> of them that keep <WH8104> the charge <WH4931> of the sanctuary <WH6944>.
Of Merari <WH4847> was the family <WH4940> of the Mahlites <WH4250>, and the family <WH4940> of the Mushites <WH4188>: these are the families <WH4940> of Merari <WH4847>.

And those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH4557>, according to the number of all the males <WH2145>, from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, were six <WH8337> thousand <WH505> and two hundred <WH3967>.

And the prince <WH5387> of the fathers <WH1>' house <WH1004> of the families <WH4940> of Merari <WH4847> was Zuriel <WH6700> the son <WH1121> of Abihail <WH32>: they shall encamp <WH2583> on the side <WH3409> of the tabernacle <WH4908> northward <WH6828>.

And the appointed <WH6486> charge <WH4931> of the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847> shall be the boards <WH7175> of the tabernacle <WH4908>, and the bars <WH1280> thereof <WH5982>, and the pillars thereof <WH134>, and the sockets thereof <WH3627>, and all the instruments thereof <WH5656>, and all the service thereof,
and the pillars <WH5982> of the court <WH2691> round about <WH5439>, and their sockets <WH134>, and their pins <WH3489>, and their cords <WH4340>.

And those that encamp <WH2583> before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH4908> eastward <WH6924>, before <WH6440> the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150> toward the sunrising <WH4217>, shall be Moses <WH4872>, and Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121>, keeping <WH8104> the charge <WH4931> of the sanctuary <WH4720> for the charge <WH4931> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; and the stranger <WH2114> that cometh nigh <WH7131> shall be put to death <WH4191>.
All that were numbered of the Levites, whom Moses and Aaron numbered at the commandment of Jehovah, by their families, all the males from a month old and upward, were twenty and two thousand.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Number <WH6485> all the first-born <WH1060> males <WH2145> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, and take <WH5375> the number <WH4557> of their names <WH8034>.

And thou shalt take <WH3947> the Levites <WH3881> for me <WH3068> (I am Jehovah) instead of all the first-born <WH1060> among the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; and the cattle <WH929> of the Levites <WH3881> instead of all the firstlings <WH1060> among the cattle <WH929> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>:
and Moses <WH4872> numbered <WH6485>, as Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> him <WH1060>, all the first-born among the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

And all the first-born <WH1060> males <WH2145> according to the number <WH4557> of names <WH8034>, from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, of those that were numbered <WH6485> of them <WH6242>, were twenty and two <WH8147> thousand <WH505> two hundred <WH3967> and threescore and thirteen <WH7657>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Take <WH3947> the Levites <WH3881> instead of all the first-born <WH1060> among the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and the cattle <WH929> of the Levites <WH3881> instead of their cattle <WH929>; and the Levites <WH3881> shall be mine <WH3068>: I am Jehovah.

And for the redemption <WH6302> of the two hundred <WH3967> and threescore and thirteen <WH7657> of the first-born <WH1060> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, that are over and above <WH5736> the number <WH5921> of the Levites <WH3881>,

thou shalt take <WH3947> five <WH2568> shekels <WH8255> apiece by the poll <WH1538>; after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary <WH6944> shalt thou take <WH3947> them <WH8255> (the shekel is twenty <WH6242> gerahs <WH1626>):
and thou shalt give <WH5414> the money <WH3701>, wherewith the odd number <WH5736> of them is redeemed <WH6302>, unto Aaron <WH175> and to his sons <WH1121>.
And Moses <WH4872> took <WH3947> the redemption-money <WH6306> from <WH3701> them that were over <WH5736> and above them that were redeemed <WH6302> by the Levites <WH3881>;

from the first-born <WH1060> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> took <WH3947> he the money <WH3701>, a thousand <WH505> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and threescore <WH8346> and five <WH2568> shekels <WH8255>, after the shekel of the sanctuary <WH6944>:

and Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> the <WH3701> redemption-money <WH6302> unto Aaron <WH175> and to his sons <WH1121>, according to the word <WH6310> of Jehovah <WH3068>, as Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.
